summary:
This mod change the apparence and some assets of the housecarls. Calder, Argis, Valdimar and Gregor also became girls, default outfit have been changed. Choose hearthfire or vanilla version, change all housecarls or turn only males ones to females.
Now your housecarls can be cute girls.
descriptionHtml:
Check out my other mods [u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6886180/?tb=mods&pUp=1]HERE[/url][/u]

This is an overhaul of all the housecarls.

This mod is standalone, Apachii hairs and CBBE bodies are built-in.

The housecarls are supposed to help and protect you and your belongings. But you are a thane, not the Jarl, so your housecarl won't be the best warrior of the hold.
To my idea, he (she) is choose among the guards. So she won't wear noble clothes, and won't have daedric sword or armor ... because all of that is really expensive !!
An other point that I dislike, they are totally reclusive, never sleeps, and wear their heavy armors even to bed. So I change these points.

Here are the changes :
- All Housecarls are now girls. Argis the Bulwark is now Chloe and Calder is now Charlene.
- Change Iona's name to Ilona, 'cause I like how this name sounds !
- All housecarls are now wearing clothes.
- Each housecarls have a guard armor of her hold in her inventory, she will equip it as soon as you recruit her.
- AI packages have been changed. So if you don't find your housecarl at home, she may brownse the marketplace, or have a drink at the local inn.
- Each housecarl have unique CBBE-based body mesh and unique tatooed body texture. Somes textures include scars. See for credits below. But for people who don't like scars and tattoos, there is an optional "no tattoo and scars" file, just overwrite main mod textures files with this one.


Only for the Hearthfire Housecarls :
- No change to their AI.
- Gregor is now Vanja, nord girl.
- Valdimar is now Gwyndoline. As he is a sorcerer, I swap the race to breton.
- Rayya is still Rayya and redguard.
- Clothing have been changed the same way.

The [u]miscellaneous[/u] section contains differants versions made by request. Have a look to the one that meets your tastes !!

[u][size=4]Requirements :[/size][/u]

Skyrim up to date.

Not necessary but very usefull for immersion :
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57376/?]Multiple Floors Sandboxing by Dovahklon[/url]

[u][size=4]Known issue :[/size][/u]

Jordis packages don't work for the moment. She only use her bed, but won't go to the marketplace or Winking Skeever.


[b][i][color=blue]VERSION[/color] FRANÇAISE [color=red]DISPONIBLE[/color] sur la page des téléchargements.[/i][/b]


[b][u]My Followers / Jetez un oeil à mes acolytes :[/u][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55904/?]Mia - Ohmes-Raht Thief - CBBE TBBP standalone[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49957/?]Veronika the Thief - CBBE UNPB TBBP standalone[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57461/?]Viktoria the Vampire - CBBE UNPB TBBP standalone[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63708/?]Sylvja the Dwemer Cyborg follower - FOMOD installer[/url]

[b][u]An armor dedicated to thieves / Une armure spéciale voleurs :[/u][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65039/?]The undercover Thief CBBE-UNP[/url]

[b][u]Nice places for thieves / De beaux endroits pour les voleurs :[/u][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74203?]Outlaws Refuges of Skyrim - WIP[/url]

[b][u]My french translations / Mes traductions :[/u][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70343/?]The Notice Board - traduction FR[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76804/?]Dwarven Bikini Armor - traduction FR[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76826/?]Banded Iron Bikini Armor - traduction FR[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77019/?]Steel Nord Plate Bikini Armor - traduction FR[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77075/?]Steel Bikini Armor - traduction FR[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77076/?]Dragon Bone Bikini Armor - traduction FR[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77700/?]Falmer Bikini Armor - traduction FR[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77712/?]Wolf Bikini Armor - traduction FR[/url]

[u][size=4]CREDITS AND THANKS :[/size][/u]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by Caliente[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49285/?]Feminine Hands CBBE UNP by Sunspot2[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37022/?]FemFeet Redesigned by Leito86[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]

The body meshes (Lydia, Chloe, Ilona, Rayya, Vanja & Gwyndoline) are made with a very usefull tool :
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio by Caliente[/url]

The body meshes (Charlene) are :
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48531/?]Caliente Beautiful Petite Edition - CBPE - by Nikitaa[/url]

The body meshes (Jordis) are :
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49375/?]Sexy Natural Body by hyp3rstrike[/url]

Some of the scars in the bodies textures (Charlene & Jordis) are
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24394/?]Body Imperfect by betterbecause[/url]

The bodies textures bases are
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal by Hello Santa[/url]

The tatooes in the bodies textures of Charlene & Lydia are
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4529/?]CBBE Slim Tribal Tattoo by Laxi2610[/url]

Vanja & Gwyndoline
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35677/?]The Coenaculi - RaceMenu Plugin for Tattoos by Desufire[/url]

and Rayya
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30404/?]THEHAGs Privat Tattoos for CBBE v3d2 by THEHAG and BladeSinger06[/url]
author: ZorlackPanzer

files.name: The Housecarls - Hearthfire version
files.changelogHtml:
Hearthfire DLC support added
Morthal housecarl is now Gwyndoline, a breton sorcerer
Dawnstar houscarl is nw Vanja, a nord two-handed warrior
